userStories.title: Deploy V2 to production (parallel with V1)
userStories.description:
ERROR LOGGING REQUIREMENTS:
- Log deployment start/end with version info
- Log each migration step with success/failure status
- Log rollback triggers and execution
- Log environment variable validation (mask values)
- Log health check results during deployment
- Log database connection verification

RAILWAY DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS:
- Use railway.toml or Procfile for configuration
- Set up Railway project with PostgreSQL and Redis addons
- Configure environment variables in Railway dashboard
- Set up deploy hooks for migrations
- Configure health check path in Railway settings
